Text.Page:
Lok's death still echoes after all this time. The gods sure mucked things up around here. Stories describe this region as among the most beautiful in the world.

Nowadays, we mostly battle the corruption and hunt for artifacts. There's a fairly hefty bounty on relics that may have divine heritage. If you find something, bring it to me first. I'll make it worth your time.

There's a tangible trace of energy I've come to associate with Lok. You see, Shakan literally tore Lok to shreds when he killed him, so it's possible we'll find traces in a wide area.

Who knows, perhaps we'll find his head!
Of course, not everyone's up to this sort of research. It's tough and requires a bit of intestinal fortitude. Still, the rewards would be more than you can countâ€”on one hand.
